name: Netflix Stories: Selling Sunset
storyline:
Welcome to The Oppenheim Group! As the newest agent at LA’s top luxury real estate brokerage, you'll need to sell your way up to win a dream listing. Immerse yourself in a world where designer clothes, deluxe accessories and high-end cars are all part of the game.

But to prove yourself, you’ll have to navigate demanding clients, office drama and cutthroat competition. Do you really have what it takes to make it in the city of the rich and famous?
